text: Bartimaeus, the son of Timaeus, was sitting by the roadside begging.
Jairus, the synagogue leader, whose daughter Jesus raised from the dead.
Joshua destroyed Jericho after crossing the Jordan.
Ahiel from Bethel rebuilt Jericho in the time of Ahab.
The parable of the Good Samaritan, where a man going down from Jerusalem to Jericho fell into the hands of robbers.
Two blind men sitting by the roadside in Jericho.
